Intervention.evidence: randomized to bypass or bypass plus surgical ventricular reconstruction

Objective.evidence: Objective: In the Surgical Treatment for Ischemic Heart Failure (STICH) trial, surgical ventricular reconstruction plus coronary artery bypass surgery was not associated with a reduction in the rate of death or cardiac hospitalization compared to bypass alone.

Method_Outcome.evidence: At 3 years, there was no difference in mortality or the combined outcome of death or cardiac hospitalization

Result_Outcome.evidence: At 3 years, there was no difference in mortality or the combined outcome of death or cardiac hospitalization
